titleStmt.title: Certaine reasons tending to prove the vnlawfulnesse and inexpediencie of all diocesan episcopacy (even the most moderate) together vvith some needfull points suddenly suggested considering the season, vntill by the good providence of God a more full and mature discourse may bee prepared and published (if need so require) by some better hand.

Certaine reasons tending to prove the vnlawfulnesse and inexpediencie of all diocesan episcopacy (even the most moderate) together vvith some needfull points suddenly suggested considering the season, vntill by the good providence of God a more full and mature discourse may bee prepared and published (if need so require) by some better hand.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
